name: Mega Man X2: Alpha
summary: Mega Man X2: Alpha is a WIP modification for Mega Man X - rebalance and stage redesign project for Megaman X2 for the SNES. Within its objective is to enhance the difficulty to provide a fresh new experience to veterans of the platform genre.

videos.name: Gameplay Trailer
